attributes.additional_details: We need fireworks taken away completely due to animals being absolutely terrified and dying because of them and also for the elderly who are terrified of them and people with ptsd, these fireworks are like bombs and need stopped
attributes.background: The biggest majority of the public would love nothing more than to see fireworks banned and the only way for that to happen is for companies to stop making them

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Ban both private and public use of fireworks & replace with cleaner alternatives
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/750214
